definition: to break the rules/to violate regulations
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

sentences.english: Which traffic offences will result in Driving Offence Points?

sentences.english: Any safety deficiencies or violations must be corrected immediately before proceeding with operations.
sentences.chinese: 操作前，必須糾正所有的安全隱患和違章。

sentences.english: The young man explained why they stopped us.
sentences.chinese: 他解釋他被要求抓違章者的原因。

sentences.english: Behavior before the adjustment of the level of fines for each violation of the twentieth million and 30 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 調整前這項違章行爲的罰款額分別是二十元及三十元。

sentences.english: Say goodbye to lawless driving, ensure the smooth flow of traffic.
sentences.chinese: 告別違章行車，保證交通順暢。
他接到違章停車罰款單。

sentences.english: The above breaching behaviors shall be stopped immediately once found.
sentences.chinese: 以上違章行爲一經查出，必須立即停止。

sentences.english: Safety regulations written in blood, and the violation of affliction.
sentences.chinese: 安全法規血寫成，違章害己害親人。

sentences.english: The club reserves the right to disqualify anybody's membership by the rules;
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部有權根據活動規則中止違章者的會員資格。

sentences.english: Abide operation regulation, forbid peccant operation.
sentences.chinese: 遵守操作規程，嚴禁違章操作。

sentences.english: There is no one of us but wishes to remove all the illegal dangerous structures in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 我們大家都希望拆除香港所有違章建築的危樓。

sentences.english: After is warned, still violated regulations opera tor's to have tos top its employment contract.
sentences.chinese: 被警告後，仍違章操作者必須中止其僱用合同。

sentences.english: I don't think that speeder will be able to beat this rap .
sentences.chinese: 我認爲那個違章超速駕駛者免不了要受罰。

definition: to expose (e.g., wrongdoing)/to accuse (in court)/to impeach/to denounce
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom)/fig. troublemaker/black sheep/rotten apple
